Content: “Marriage Story” is a 2019 American comedy-drama film written and directed by Noah Baumbach. The film stars Scarlett Johansson, Adam Driver, Laura Dern, Alan Alda and Merritt Wever, following a married couple going through a coast-to-coast divorce. A stage director and an actress struggle through a grueling, coast-to-coast divorce that pushes them to their personal and creative extremes. It is scheduled to receive a limited theatrical release on Wednesday.
